original: @342a # // shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: @342a # // shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: Verses of auspiciousness

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing //
analyzed: lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing //
translated: May the auspiciousness of the gods be accomplished,

original: phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des //
analyzed: phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des //
translated: and may the auspiciousness of the directions🔽accomplish your aims.🔽May everything be auspicious and quickly concordant.

original: khyed kyi don rnams su grub gyur cig / thams cad myur du mthun par shog / phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar //
analyzed: khyed kyi don rnams su grub gyur cig / thams cad myur du mthun par shog / phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar //
translated: Just as a garland rests on the head,🔽may glory be in the right hand,🔽and may glory also be in the left,🔽and may there be glory in all limbs.

original: lag pa g-yas na dpal yod shog / g-yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig / yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog / tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas na dpal yod shog / g-yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig / yan lag kun la'ang dpal yod shog / tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing //

original: phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams //
translated: who go in the ten directions,

original: rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing //
analyzed: rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing //
translated: may they obtain great profit🔽and may that also generate happiness.

original: de yang bde ba skyed par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //
analyzed: de yang bde ba skyed par shog / dgos pa la la gang gi phyir //

original: shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //
analyzed: shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na //

original: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //
analyzed: gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi //

analyzed: rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig / smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag pa nab so dang // rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste //

original: de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa //
analyzed: de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa //

original: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
analyzed: rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni //
translated: These seven lunar mansions

original: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa //

original: shar phyogs logs na yod ces bya //
analyzed: shar phyogs logs na yod ces bya //

analyzed: de dag khyed la kun du srungs // de dag bdag po rgyal po ni //
translated: May they protect you in every way.🔽Their lord and king is known as

original: yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste //
analyzed: yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste //

original: de ni dri za kun gyi bdag / nyi ma lhan cig bsrung bar shog / de la bu ni mang yod pa //
analyzed: de ni dri za kun gyi bdag / nyi ma lhan cig bsrung bar shog / de la bu ni mang yod pa //

original: mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //
analyzed: mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste //

original: dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //
analyzed: dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang //

original: de rnams khyed la nad med cing //
analyzed: de rnams khyed la nad med cing //

analyzed: shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig / shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na //
translated: In the eastern direction

original: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //
analyzed: lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de //

analyzed: ldog pa na'ang bkra shis shog /
translated: May it be auspicious when you return.🔽May it be auspicious to see relatives,🔽May it be auspicious to be seen by relatives.

original: gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog / gnyen gyis lta ba'ang bkra shis shog / dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal che dang // dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas //
analyzed: gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog / gnyen gyis lta ba'ang bkra shis shog / dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal che dang // dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas //
translated: With Indra, the great king of the yakshas, and the arhats, with compassion,🔽May you attain auspiciousness and the auspicious nectar in all ways.🔽Brahma, likewise Vaisravana, the stainless ones, the liberated ones,

original: thams cad du ni bkra shis dang // bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog / tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang // zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang // klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes bsrung //
analyzed: thams cad du ni bkra shis dang // bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog / tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang // zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang // klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes bsrung //
translated: The nagas and yakshas always protect with compassion.

original: ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog /'phags pa rgya cher rol ba'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog /'phags pa rgya cher rol ba'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the verses of auspiciousness that appear in the chapter of Anāthapiṇḍada and Sudatta in the noble extensive play.
